name: Tilted Try
text: When you draw for your normal draw in your Draw Phase: You can reveal 1 of those cards; place it on the bottom of the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. When you draw by a card effect: You can reveal 1 of those cards; send this card to the GY, and if you do, place that card on the bottom of the Deck, and if you do that, draw 1 card.
